name: zarm
description: 基于 React 的移动端UI库

scripts.clean: rimraf types lib es dist assets coverage bundle components/*.js components/**/*.js components/**/**/*.js examples-rn/**/build examples-rn/**/bundle
scripts.build:es: rimraf es && zarm build --mode es --path components --out-dir es --copy-files --build-css && tsc --outDir es -d --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.build:lib: rimraf lib && zarm build --mode lib --path components --out-dir lib --copy-files --build-css && tsc --outDir lib -d --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.build:umd: rimraf dist && zarm build --mode umd --path components/style/entry.tsx,components/index.tsx --out-dir dist && zarm build --mode umd-ugly --path components/style/entry.tsx,components/index.tsx --out-dir dist
scripts.build:rn: rimraf components/**/*.js components/**/**/*.js && zarm build --mode native --path components
scripts.build:ios: rimraf bundle/ios/* && node scripts/native/mkdir && npm run build:rn && react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file examples-rn/index.js --bundle-output bundle/ios/index.bundle --assets-dest bundle/ios
scripts.build:android: rimraf bundle/android/* && node scripts/native/mkdir && npm run build:rn && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file examples-rn/index.js --bundle-output bundle/android/index.bundle --assets-dest bundle/android
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd
scripts.deploy:build: rimraf assets && mkdir assets && touch assets/CNAME && echo 'zarm.design' > assets/CNAME && zarm deploy
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:style
scripts.test: rimraf coverage && npm run test:h5 -- -c && cp ./coverage/coverage-final.json ./coverage/coverage-h5-final.json && npm run test:rn -- -c && cp ./coverage/coverage-final.json ./coverage/coverage-rn-final.json && node ./scripts/jest/mapCoverage.js
